solution_line_template: First find the total cost of the two ${card_value_traded} cards: ${card_value_traded}/card * {num_cards_traded} cards = $<<{card_value_traded}*{num_cards_traded}={total_cost_traded}>>{total_cost_traded}

Then subtract the cost of the cards Nicky gave away from the cost of the card he received to find his profit: ${card_value_received} - ${total_cost_traded} = $<<{card_value_received}-{total_cost_traded}={profit}>>{profit}
